name: Death Route To Victory (Naman_Jain)
description:
A character at the starting point. Roads take him till the end, and these roads become thinner as the game progresses. The player has to remain balanced in the road and reach the endpoint collecting as many coins as possible. Those coins will be located randomly on these roads and they will be of two types giving them different scores when they collect them. There is also a big gem present at the ending point of the game so when the player picks the gem the game finishes. 

Character

The only character of the game is our player (a ball). It is scared to fall and doesn’t want to fall from narrow roads heading towards goal.

Goal

To reach the endpoint collecting the maximum number of coins.

Challenge

The way by which the player will move will become thinner at some random places as the game progresses. So the main challenge would be to maintain balance with increasing speed.

Rules
  1. You can move the player in forward direction as well as left and right.
  2. If you are able to go to the finishing point then you are the winner.
  3. If you fall down, then you will lose the game
  4. Your score will be displayed continuously on the screen. It can be increased by collecting coins present on the road.
